title: Gerald McCoy signing, Cam Newton health with Jourdan Rodrigue, plus NFC South O/U (Football 6/4)
description:
Will Brinson breaks down the latest news and notes from around the NFL then gives his take on the NFC South over/unders before welcoming on Jourdan Rodrigue of the Charlotte Observer to talk about the Carolina Panthers offseason, the signing of Gerald McCoy, what the defense will look like and the health of Cam Newton. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
